item.title: Ian Edwards
item.dc:creator: joe.rogan
item.description: #1324. Ian Edwards is a stand up comedian and also hosts his own podcast called “Soccer Comic Rant” on iTunes/Stitcher. His new special "Bill Burr presents Ian Talk: Ideas Not Worth Spreading" premieres July 12 on Comedy Central.
item.content:encoded: #1324. Ian Edwards is a stand up comedian and also hosts his own podcast called “Soccer Comic Rant” on iTunes/Stitcher. His new special "Bill Burr presents Ian Talk: Ideas Not Worth Spreading" premieres July 12 on Comedy Central.

item.title: Andy Ngo
item.dc:creator: joe.rogan
item.description: #1323. Andy Ngo is a political journalist best known for covering street protests in Portland, Oregon. He has written columns in The Wall Street Journal, the New York Post and National Review, amongst others, and is an editor for Quillette.
item.content:encoded: #1323. Andy Ngo is a political journalist best known for covering street protests in Portland, Oregon. He has written columns in The Wall Street Journal, the New York Post and National Review, amongst others, and is an editor for Quillette.

item.title: Reggie Watts
item.dc:creator: joe.rogan
item.description: #1322. Reggie Watts is a musician, singer, beatboxer, actor, and comedian. His improvised musical sets are created using only his voice, a keyboard, and a looping machine. He is also currently the announcer and band leader on The Late Late Show with James Corden.
item.content:encoded: #1322. Reggie Watts is a musician, singer, beatboxer, actor, and comedian. His improvised musical sets are created using only his voice, a keyboard, and a looping machine. He is also currently the announcer and band leader on The Late Late Show with James Corden.

item.title: Robert Oberst
item.dc:creator: joe.rogan
item.description: #1321. Robert Oberst is a professional strongman who competes yearly in The World's Strongest Man competition. He's can also be seen on the History Channel's "The Strongest Man In History" premiering July 10 at 10pm ET.
item.content:encoded: #1321. Robert Oberst is a professional strongman who competes yearly in The World's Strongest Man competition. He's can also be seen on the History Channel's "The Strongest Man In History" premiering July 10 at 10pm ET.

item.title: Eric Weinstein
item.dc:creator: joe.rogan
item.description: #1320. Eric Weinstein is a mathematician and economist, and he is also the managing director at Thiel Capital. His new podcast "The Portal" is available now on Apple Podcasts & Spotify. https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/the-portal/id1469999563
item.content:encoded: #1320. Eric Weinstein is a mathematician and economist, and he is also the managing director at Thiel Capital. His new podcast "The Portal" is available now on Apple Podcasts & Spotify. https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/the-portal/id1469999563

item.title: JRE MMA Show #69 with Yves Edwards
item.dc:creator: joe.rogan
item.description: #069. Joe is joined by UFC Lightweight veteran and current PFL commentator, Yves Edwards.
item.content:encoded: #069. Joe is joined by UFC Lightweight veteran and current PFL commentator, Yves Edwards.

item.title: Joey Diaz
item.dc:creator: joe.rogan
item.description: #1319. Joey “CoCo” Diaz is a Cuban-American stand up comedian and actor. Joey also hosts his own podcast called “The Church of What’s Happening Now”. https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCv695o3i-JmkUB7tPbtwXDA

item.title: Hotep Jesus
item.dc:creator: joe.rogan
item.description: #1318. Hotep Jesus is a tech investor, marketer and author. His book "Dominate Twitter" is available on http://bryansharpe.co
item.content:encoded: #1318. Hotep Jesus is a tech investor, marketer and author. His book "Dominate Twitter" is available on http://bryansharpe.co

item.title: Andrew Santino
item.dc:creator: joe.rogan
item.description: #1317. Andrew Santino is a stand up comedian and actor. Check out his podcast “Whiskey Ginger” available on Apple Podcasts & YouTube.
item.content:encoded: #1317. Andrew Santino is a stand up comedian and actor. Check out his podcast “Whiskey Ginger” available on Apple Podcasts & YouTube.

item.title: Abby Martin
item.dc:creator: joe.rogan
item.description: #1316. Abby Martin is a journalist and host of the “The Empire Files” — http://theempirefiles.tv The Empire Files documentary "Gaza Fight For Freedom" will be available soon. https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCG29FnXZm4F5U8xpqs1cs1Q
